name: Opening Volley
text: Your ranged assault leaves your foe disoriented and vulnerable to your melee attack.
benefit: Whenever you deal damage with a ranged attack, you gain a +4 circumstance bonus on the next melee attack roll you make against the opponent. This attack must occur before the end of your next turn.
staminaText: When you deal damage with a ranged attack, you can spend 2 stamina points to gain a +4 circumstance bonus on the next two melee attack rolls you make against that opponent until the end of your next turn, instead of on only the next melee attack.
text_zh: 你用远程武器封锁敌人的活动空间，使他无从闪避你的近战攻击。
benefit_zh: 每当你对一个敌人造成远程伤害，你对该敌人进行的下一次近战攻击检定将会有+4环境加值。这次近战攻击必须在你下一轮结束前进行。
staminaText_zh: 当你使用远端攻击造成伤害时，你可以消耗2点耐力，让你对该敌人进行的之后两次近战攻击获得+4环境加值，而不是只有第一次近战攻击。
